Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time between SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Awaiting EIC Decision to be followed by SW-EIC Accept
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Average time for SW-Awaiting EIC Decision across all variants ending in an EIC decision (e.g., SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Major Revision)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Total waiting time to the SW-Awaiting EIC Decision after the last reviewer agreement (SW-Reviewer Agreed or RW-Reviewer Agreed)
Metric: the sum of the duration between the first time instant when `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' or `ACTIVITY` == 'RW-Reviewer Agreed' and the last time instant when `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Time from the final SW-Reviewer Agreed to the start of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Awaiting EIC Decision and the subsequent EIC decision activity (e.g., SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit, SW-EIC Minor Revision)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit'

Name: Average time until SW-Awaiting EIC Decision is performed following completion of all required reviewer agreements in a case
Metric: the average of the duration between the first time instant when `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' or `ACTIVITY` == 'RW-Reviewer Agreed' and the last time instant when `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time between the last occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants involving multiple revision rounds
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time from SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision compared to the average time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Cycle Time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision measured from its start timestamp to the timestamp of the immediately following EIC decision activity
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in cases where prior activities include SW–Major Revision due in 1 week versus SW–Minor Revision due in 1 month
Metric: the sum of the duration between the first time instant when `ACTIVITY` == 'SW–Major Revision due in 1 week' or `ACTIVITY` == 'SW–Minor Revision due in 1 month' and the last time instant when `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Elapsed time between Manuscript Export Succeeded (post-revision) and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in revised submission variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time for SW-Awaiting EIC Decision grouped by case:concept:name to identify outlier cases with prolonged EIC deliberation
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'", 'end': '', 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'concept:name'}"
